fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Budget, Trade, Taxation
eu_initiatives: We follow EU policies in the context of our professional activities. We are interested in learning how policymaking will impact economic conditions in the economies we are active in (developed and emerging markets).
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
position: Partner, General Counsel and Chief Compliance Officer
goals__remit: Finisterre Capital (“Finisterre”) is a global alternative asset management company with offices in the UK, Malta and the U.S. Established in 2002, we manage capital in fixed-income markets, with an emphasis on emerging markets, across a suite of Hedge Fund and regulated products
